task_intent.primary_question: Segment ecommerce customers based on purchasing behavior patterns to enable targeted marketing campaigns
task_intent.decision_context: Planning quarterly marketing budget allocation across customer segments to maximize revenue growth and customer lifetime value metrics
task_intent.success_criteria: Distinct customer segments with clear behavioral characteristics and actionable targeting recommendations
task_intent.constraints: Focus on purchase frequency and monetary value patterns excluding promotional campaign data
